pageSetting.title: 履职绩效查询

attribute.value: select lbdh as key, lbmc as value from csb_hylb

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjrq$ as tjrq,jglb.lbdh,jglb.lbmc jglbmc,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,coalesce(gw.gwmc,'') as gwmc,gw.gwbh,hylb.lbdh,hylb.lbmc hylbmc,jx.khjxjs,jx.khdf,jx.khjx from jxgz_lzjx jx inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=jx.khdxdh left join khdx_hygw gw on hy.khdxdh=gw.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between gw.qsrq and gw.jsrq inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=cy.jgkhdxdh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and jx.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ and hylb.lbdh='$lbdh$' order by jg.jgdh,hy.hydh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq,jglb.lbdh,jglb.lbmc jglbmc,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,coalesce(gw.gwmc,'') as gwmc,gw.gwbh,hylb.lbdh,hylb.lbmc hylbmc,jx.khjxjs,jx.khdf,jx.khjx from jxgz_lzjx jx inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=jx.khdxdh left join khdx_hygw gw on hy.khdxdh=gw.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between gw.qsrq and gw.jsrq inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_jgcy cy on hy.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=cy.jgkhdxdh inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and jx.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ and hylb.lbdh='$lbdh$' order by jg.jgdh,hy.hydh ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select lbdh as key, lbmc as value from csb_hylb
